name: WhoseTaglineIsItAnyway
0: ”Alexa, open Whose Tagline Is It Anyway”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose tagline is it anyway
Developer Terms of Use
des: In Whose Tagline Is It Anyway, you will be given the tagline for a random movie from a pool of 1,500 semi-popular movies. From that, you must deduce what movie the tagline is for. Simple but addictive. And if you enjoy playing Whose Tagline Is It Anyway, you may also be interested in Good Word Hunting. Good Word Hunting is an additional game available for purchase. At the start of the game, you will be given up to 5 keywords associated with a random movie. With those keywords, you will then be asked how many cast members from lowest billed to highest would you need to guess what the movie is.
